Reno.Truckee Meadows Community College: Truckee Meadows Community College is a 2-year, public community college and technical college located in the Truckee Meadows of Reno, Nevada. The Community College is primarily a commuter campus  with 5 locations. The main (Dandini) campus is located just north of Interstate 80 and U.S. Route 395 in Reno.
